house_listing.house_description: 3600 sq. Ft. All brick in quiet cul-de-sac in prestigeous quail point cove. Large deck with built in hot tub. Interior freshly painted. Full permanent attic, lots of storage. Location, location, location!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Attic Fan, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced,Foyer, Garage Door Opener, Outside Sprinkler System, Utility Room,Walk-In Closet(s)
